CmdLine: apk update &&     apk add --no-cache bash git python3 postgresql-client py3-psycopg2 &&     python3 -m ensurepip &&     rm -r /usr/lib/python*/ensurepip &&     pip3 install --upgrade pip setuptools &&     if [ ! -e /usr/bin/pip ]; then ln -s pip3 /usr/bin/pip ; fi &&     rm -r /root/.cache
Commands.Name: run
